name: MySensors
description: This module allows Gladys to control a MySensors network (Arduino + NRF24L01).
instructionsHTML:
Requirement

Need Gladys version >= 3.0.0.

Presentation

After installation, Gladys becomes a controler of your MySensors network.

Installation

For USB connection

  • Plug your gateway (Arduino) on your Raspberry Pi.
  • Find the name of the USB port the stick is connected to (it looks like /dev/ttyACM0).
    • You can try to execute ls /dev/tty* before and after pluggging the gateway to find which port it is.
  • Install the module in Gladys in the store.
  • Go in global parameters in Gladys. Add these parameters :
    • mysensors_gatewaytype : Serial
    • mysensors_gatewayport : /dev/ttyACM0 for example
    • mysensors_formattime : utc or local
  • Reboot Gladys.
  • On start, the module log the connection

    • mysensors_gatewayaddress : 10.0.1.99 for example

instructionsMarkDown:
## Requirement

Need Gladys version >= 3.0.0.

## Presentation

After installation, Gladys becomes a controler of your [MySensors](https://www.mysensors.org/) network.

## Installation
### For USB connection

* Plug your gateway (Arduino) on your Raspberry Pi.
* Find the name of the USB port the stick is connected to (it looks like `/dev/ttyACM0`).
    * You can try to execute `ls /dev/tty*` before and after pluggging the gateway to find which port it is.
* Install the module in Gladys in the store.
* Go in global parameters in Gladys. Add these parameters :
    * `mysensors_gatewaytype` : `Serial`
    * `mysensors_gatewayport` : `/dev/ttyACM0` for example
    * `mysensors_formattime` : `utc` or `local`
    ![Texte alternatif](http://nsa37.casimages.com/img/2017/07/28/170728081453961097.png "texte pour le titre, facultatif")
* Reboot Gladys.
* On start, the module log the connection
    * ![Texte alternatif](http://nsa38.casimages.com/img/2016/11/25/161125124143656804.png "texte pour le titre, facultatif")
* In Gladys, a device have been add
    * ![Texte alternatif](http://nsa38.casimages.com/img/2016/11/25/161125124143588679.png "texte pour le titre, facultatif")

### For Ethernet connection

* Plug your gateway (Arduino) in your network.
* Install the module in Gladys in the store.
* Go in global parameters in Gladys. Add these parameters :
    * `mysensors_gatewaytype` : `Ethernet`
    * `mysensors_gatewayport` : `9999` for example
    * `mysensors_gatewayaddress` : `10.0.1.99` for example
    * `mysensors_formattime` : `utc` or `local`
    ![Texte alternatif](http://nsa37.casimages.com/img/2017/07/28/170728081453894192.png "texte pour le titre, facultatif")
* Reboot Gladys.
* On start, the module log the connection
    * ![Texte alternatif](http://nsa38.casimages.com/img/2016/11/25/161125124936884704.png "texte pour le titre, facultatif")
* In Gladys, a device have been add
    * ![Texte alternatif](http://nsa38.casimages.com/img/2016/11/25/161125124143588679.png "texte pour le titre, facultatif")
